pages.text: The only required Botania flower is the $(c:/open-patchouli-book @s botania:lexicon botania:basics/pure_daisy 1)$(t:Go to pure daisy in Lexica Botania)Pure Daisy$(/t)$(/c), but there definitely many more that you will find useful, such as:$(li1)$(c:/open-patchouli-book @s botania:lexicon botania:functional_flowers/orechid 1)$(t:Go to orechid in Botania Lexicon)Orechid$(/t)$(/c) - overworld ores for heavy mana investment$(li1)$(c:/open-patchouli-book @s botania:lexicon botania:functional_flowers/orechid_ignem 1)$(t:Go to orechid ignem in Lexica Botania)Orechid Ignem$(/t)$(/c) - nether Orechid$(li1)$(c:/open-patchouli-book @s botania:lexicon botania:functional_flowers/vinculotus 1)$(t:Go to vinculotus in Lexica Botania)Vinculotus$(/t)$(/c) - stops endermen from teleporting$(li1)$(c:/open-patchouli-book @s botania:lexicon botania:functional_flowers/hopperhock 1)$(t:Go to hopperhock in Lexica Botania)Hopperhock$(/t)$(/c) - filterable vacuum block$(li1)Read your Lexica Botania for more!
Most of these special flowers except are crafted in the Teatable ($(c:/create ponder kubejs:teatable)$(t:ponder the table!)Ponder$(/t)$(/c))
